replies.msg: STEM is not another kind of knowledge. It is an integration of all kind of learned knowledge. Students in USA are weak in this aspect that is my STEM was promoted a decade ago. It is a problem-solving approach that crosses the borders of every subject. STEAM even includes Art in solving a problem. We don't lack knowledge. We don't have the chance of applying knowledge. Can you see how creative Hong Kongers is in this movement? They integrate all kind of materials, groups of people and international linkages to keep this movement goes on. Keep fighting Hong Kongers! Five demands, not one less! May Glory be to HK!
